## Sprint 8: V3 Analytics Dashboard

**Duration**: 2 weeks  
**Priority**: Low  
**Goal**: Analytics dashboard for leadership

### Tasks

- [ ] **Attendance Analytics**
  - [ ] Attendance heatmaps
  - [ ] Student attendance trends
  - [ ] Class attendance patterns
  - [ ] Absence analysis
  - [ ] Export reports

- [ ] **Staff Load Reports**
  - [ ] Teaching load analysis
  - [ ] Period distribution
  - [ ] Replacement counts
  - [ ] Workload fairness metrics
  - [ ] Visualizations

- [ ] **Room Utilisation**
  - [ ] Room usage statistics
  - [ ] Underutilised rooms
  - [ ] Overbooked rooms
  - [ ] Usage trends
  - [ ] Recommendations

- [ ] **Assessment Overload**
  - [ ] Assessment calendar analysis
  - [ ] Overload detection
  - [ ] Student workload warnings
  - [ ] Balancing recommendations

- [ ] **Duty Coverage**
  - [ ] Duty distribution analysis
  - [ ] Fairness metrics
  - [ ] Coverage gaps
  - [ ] Recommendations

- [ ] **Dashboard UI**
  - [ ] Interactive charts
  - [ ] Date range filters
  - [ ] Export functionality
  - [ ] Scheduled reports

### Acceptance Criteria

- ✅ Analytics dashboards load quickly
- ✅ Data visualizations are clear
- ✅ Reports can be exported
- ✅ Insights are actionable
- ✅ Leadership can make data-driven decisions

### Dependencies

- V1 & V2 complete
- Historical data available
- Analytics events being tracked

### Notes

This provides leadership with insights not available in Compass.
